dmca.title: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13336
dmca.body:
Please note that the website referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 1:33:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on May 30, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: Jim Chen [mailto:JimC@nr-online.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, May 30, 2006 7:23 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetResults ppsports.net FOM_NRID13336
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetResults ppsports.net FOM_NRID13336


Dear Sir/Madam

The site (http://www.ppsports.net/) has offered our client's AV content
again (05/28/06), please find attached screen shot.

If you require any further details, please do not hesitate to contact
us.

Kind regards,
Jim CHEN
NetResult


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: 15 May 2006 22:36
To: JimC@nr-online.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetResults ppsports.net FOM_NRID13336

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: Jim Chen [mailto:JimC@nr-online.com] 

Posted At: Thursday, May 11, 2006 10:45 AM

Posted To: Copyright

Conversation: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13336

Subject: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13336





NetResult Internal Reference:  FOM_NRID13336



Please quote the above FOM_NRID13336 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue.



Dear Sirs 



Formula One Administration Limited ("FOA") has the exclusive right to
commercially exploit the FIA Formula One World Championship ("the
Championship") including, but not limited to, all moving images, other
audio/video content, timing data and results.  In addition, FOA's
associated is the owner of numerous trademark applications and
registrations throughout the world relating to the Championship,
including F1?, FORMULA 1? and official logos.



We have noticed that your Web Site http://www.ppsports.net/ is
displaying and/or offering:



? Formula One A/V content. All copyright in such images vests with FOA.



As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from FOA or FOL to
use this content, your present use is an infringement of FOA's and FOL's
rights.




Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of FOL's or FOA's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement
not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which
are expressly reserved.  



Formal Declaration



I hereby state that FOA and FOL are the owners of the exclusive rights
referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on their behalf
with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of FOA and
FOL I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the
content in the manner complained of is not authorised by FOL or FOA,
their agents, or the law.



I, Jonny Hartley, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.





Yours faithfully,



Jonny Hartley



NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House

583 Fulham Road

London

UK SW6 5UA



Tel: 0207 471 1730



Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.



--------------------------------------------------------------------

NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management

--------------------------------------------------------------------
dmca.principal_name: NetResult Ltd. (for Formula One Administration Limited "FOA")
